strings.string:
I came here with some friends to
catch us some BUG POKéMON!

They're all itching to get into
some POKéMON battles!

Hey! You have POKéMON!
Come on!

Let's battle 'em!
No!\nCATERPIE can't hack it!
Ssh! You'll scare the bugs away.\nAnother time, okay?

Yo!
You can't jam out if you're a

POKéMON TRAINER!
Huh?\nI ran out of POKéMON!
That totally stinks! I'm going to\ncatch some stronger ones!
Hey, wait up!\nWhat's the hurry? Why the rush?
I give!\nYou're good at this!

Sometimes, you can find stuff on
the ground.

I'm looking for the stuff I
dropped. Can you help me?
I might be little, but I won't like\nit if you go easy on me!
Oh, boo.\nNothing went right.
I lost some of my allowance...
Did you know that POKéMON evolve?
Oh!\nI lost!
BUG POKéMON evolve quickly.\nThey're a lot of fun!

I was throwing POKé BALLS to
catch POKéMON, and I ran out.

That's why you can never have too
many POKé BALLS.

TRAINER TIPS

If your POKéMON are weak and you
want to avoid battles, stay away

from grassy areas!
For poison, use ANTIDOTE!\nGet it at POKéMON MARTS!

TRAINER TIPS

Contact PROF. OAK via a PC to
get your POKéDEX evaluated!

TRAINER TIPS

You can't catch a POKéMON that
belongs to someone else.

Throw POKé BALLS only at wild
POKéMON to catch them!

TRAINER TIPS

Weaken POKéMON before attempting
capture!

When healthy, they may escape!
LEAVING VIRIDIAN FOREST\nPEWTER CITY AHEAD

WHOA!
You shocked me!

...Oh, you're just a kid!
Wow!\nShocked again!
Kids like you shouldn't be\nwandering around here in the dark.
Did you come to explore the cave,\ntoo?
Losing stinks!\nIt's so uncool.
I came all the way down here to\nshow off to girls.
Wow! It's way bigger in here than\nI thought!
Oh!\nI lost it!
How do you get out of here?\nIt's so big, I may get lost.
What!\nDon't sneak up on me!
My POKéMON won't do!
I have to find stronger POKéMON.\nWhere might they be?

What?
I'm waiting for my friends to find

me here.
I lost?
I came because I heard there are\nsome very rare fossils here.
Suspicious men are in the cave.\nWhat about you?
You got me!
I saw them!\nI'm sure they're from TEAM ROCKET!
You need to go through this cave\nto get to CERULEAN CITY.
I lost.

ZUBAT is tough!
But if you can catch one, you'll

be able to count on it.
Beware!\nZUBAT is a bloodsucker!

Hi, I'm excavating for fossils here
under MT. MOON.

Sometimes, BROCK of PEWTER GYM
lends me a hand.

Hey, stop!

I found these fossils!
They're both mine!
Okay!\nI'll share!
We'll each take a fossil!\nNo being greedy!
All right.\nThen this fossil is mine!

Far away, on CINNABAR ISLAND,
there's a POKéMON LAB.

They do research on regenerating
fossils.

We, TEAM ROCKET, shall find the
fossils!

Reviving POKéMON from them will
earn us huge riches!
Urgh!\nNow I'm mad!
You made me mad!\nTEAM ROCKET will blacklist you!

We, TEAM ROCKET, are POKéMON
gangsters!

We strike fear with our strength!
I blew it!
Darn it all!\nMy associates won't stand for this!
We're pulling a big job here!\nGet lost, kid!
So, you are good...
If you find a fossil, give it to me\nand scram!

Little kids shouldn't be messing
around with grown-ups!

It could be bad news!
I'm steamed!
POKéMON lived here long before\npeople came.
Do you want the DOME FOSSIL?
Do you want the HELIX FOSSIL?
Obtained the HELIX FOSSIL!
Obtained the DOME FOSSIL!

Bonjour!
I am le waiter on this ship!

I will be happy to serve you
anything you please!

... ... ...
Ah! Le strong silent type!

The passengers are restless from
this long voyage.

You might be challenged by the
more bored ones!

This ship, she is a luxury liner for
TRAINERS of the world!

At every port, we hold parties with
invited TRAINERS.

{06}: Bonjour!
{01}!

Imagine seeing you here!
{01}, were you really invited?

So how's your POKéDEX coming?

I already caught 40 kinds, pal.
Different kinds are everywhere.

Crawl around in grassy areas, and
look hard for them.

Humph!

At least you're raising your
POKéMON!

{06}: I heard there was a CUT
master on board.

But he was just a seasick old man!

CUT itself is really useful.
Yup, it'll be handy.

You should go see him, too.
Smell ya!

Our CAPTAIN is a sword master.
He's awesome at using CUT.

They say he even teaches CUT
to POKéMON!
The party's over.\nThe ship will be departing soon.
Whew!\nScrubbing decks is hard work!

Urf... I feel ill...

I got seasick, so I stepped out to
get some air...
Hey, matey!\n\nLet's do a little jig!
You're impressive!
How many kinds of POKéMON do you\nthink there are in this big world?
Ahoy, there!\nAre you seasick?
I was just careless!
My pa said there are 100 kinds of\nPOKéMON. I think there are more.

You, mon petit!
We're busy here!

Out of the way!
I saw an odd BERRY in the trash.\nI wonder what that was?
I'm so busy I'm getting dizzy!\nYou have to give me room here!

Hum-de-hum-de-ho...

I peel spuds every day!
Hum-hum...

Did you hear about SNORLAX?
It's a glutton.

No other POKéMON eats and sleeps
the way SNORLAX can and does!

Snivel... Sniff...

I only get to peel onions...
Snivel...

Er-hem!
Indeed I am le CHEF!

Le main course is

Salmon du Salad!

Les guests may gripe it's fish
again, however!
Eels au Barbecue!\n\nLes guests will mutiny, I fear.

Prime Beefsteak!

But, have I enough fillets du
beef?

CAPTAIN: Ooargh...
I feel hideous...

Urrp! Seasick...

{01} rubbed the CAPTAIN's
back!

Rub-rub...
Rub-rub...

CAPTAIN: Whew! Thank you!
I'm feeling much better now.

You want to see my hidden CUT
technique?

I could show you my prized CUT
technique if I weren't so ill...

I know! You can have this!
This HIDDEN MACHINE!

Teach CUT to your POKéMON, and
you can see it CUT anytime!
{01} obtained HM01\nfrom the CAPTAIN!

Using CUT, you can chop down
small trees.

Why not try it with the trees
around VERMILION CITY?

CAPTAIN: ...Whew!

Now that I'm not sick anymore,
I guess it's time.

The S.S. ANNE will set sail soon!

Farewell, until our return to
VERMILION CITY!
Oh, no!\nYou have no room for this!
Yuck!\nShouldn't have looked!
How to Conquer Seasickness...\nThe CAPTAIN's reading this!

Ssh...!
I'm a GLOBAL POLICE agent.

I'm on the trail of TEAM ROCKET.
They're up to nothing good!
I love POKéMON!\nDo you?
Wow! \nYou're great!

Listen, listen!
Let me be your friend, okay?

Then we can trade POKéMON and
do stuff.
I collected these POKéMON\nfrom all around the world!
Oh, no!\nI went around the world for these!

You hurt my poor POKéMON!

I demand that you heal them at a
POKéMON CENTER!
We are cruising around the world,\nmy children and I.
A world cruise is so elegant yet\ncozy!
I always travel with WIGGLYTUFF.\nI never leave home without it.
WIGGLYTUFF: Puup pupuu!
Waiter, I would like a cherry pie,\nplease!
Waitress, I would like a cherry\npie, please!
You insolent pup!\nHow dare you barge in!
Humph! You rude child!\nYou have no sense of courtesy!
I wish to be left alone!\nGet out!

I am but a solitary traveler...

My sole companions and friends are
POKéMON I caught on my journeys...
My, my friends...
You should be nice to friends!

I've journeyed far and wide, but in
all my travels I've never seen

any POKéMON sleep like this one!

It was something like this!
Competing against the young keeps\nme youthful.
Good match!\nAh, I feel young again!
Fifteen years ago, I would\nhave won!
Check out what I fished up!
I'm all out!

Party?

The cruise ship's party should be
over by now.
Ah, yes, I have seen some POKéMON\nferry people across the water!

Small trees can be chopped down
using the move CUT.

But remember this!
CUT is an HM technique.

Once learned, it is not so easily
discarded.
Which do you find more worthy,\na strong or a rare POKéMON?
I must salute you!
Personally, I prefer strong and\nrare POKéMON.
I don't believe I saw you at the\nparty?
Take it easy!
Oh, I adore your strong POKéMON!\nOh, how I envy you for them!

Have you gone to the SAFARI ZONE
in FUCHSIA CITY?

There are many kinds of rare
POKéMON.

Me and my daddy think the SAFARI
ZONE is awesome!

I wish we could go there again.
The CAPTAIN said he's awfully sick.\nHe was all pale.
I hear many people get seasick.
Matey, you're walking the plank if\nyou lose!
Argh!\nBeaten by a kid!
When we're out at sea, jellyfish\nPOKéMON sometimes drift by.

Hello, stranger!

I can't tell if you're from the seas
or mountains, but stop and chat.

All my POKéMON are from the sea.
Darn!\nI let that one get away!
I was going to make you my\nassistant, too!
Even us sailors have POKéMON, too!
Okay, you're not bad.
We caught all our POKéMON while\nwe were out at sea.
I like feisty kids like you!
Argh!\nLost it!
Sea POKéMON live in deep water.\nYou'll need a ROD to fish them up!
You know what they say about\nsailors and battling!
Right!\nGood battle, mate!
Hahaha!\nWant to be a sailor, mate?
Come on, then!\nMy sailor's pride is at stake!
Your spirit sank me!
Did you see the FISHING GURU in\nVERMILION CITY?

My buddy MACHOKE is super strong!

He has enough STRENGTH to move
big rocks!
MACHOKE: Gwoh! Goggoh!
You look tired. Would you like to\ntake a short rest?
I'm glad to see that everyone is\nlooking refreshed and chipper.
Oh, I'm sorry for fussing over you.\nYou look like my little brother...
Oh, I'm sorry for fussing over you.\nYou look like my little sister...
People often lose things in the\ndarkness of the UNDERGROUND PATH.
I heard a sleepy POKéMON appeared\nout near CELADON CITY, too.

The DEPARTMENT STORE in CELADON
has a great selection.

Do you go there very often?

I went inside ROCK TUNNEL, but it's
pitch-black and scary in there.

If I could get a POKéMON to use
FLASH and light it up...

Well, isn't this a surprise!
DIGLETT dug this long tunnel!

It goes right to VIRIDIAN CITY,
they tell me.
I wonder if you are good enough\nfor me?
I lost out...
I never wanted to lose to anybody,\nespecially to a younger kid...
I can see you're good.\nLet me see exactly how good!
I had a chance...
Tch!\nI concede, you are better than I!
If you can get through here,\nyou can go meet the ELITE FOUR.
No!\nUnbelievable!
I can beat you when it comes to\nknowledge about POKéMON!
This here is VICTORY ROAD.\nIt's the final test for TRAINERS!
Atcho!
If you get stuck, try moving some\nboulders around.
Ah, so you wish to challenge the\nELITE FOUR?
You got me!
{06} also came through here.
Come on!\nI'll whip you!
I got whipped!
You earned the right to be on\nVICTORY ROAD...
Is VICTORY ROAD too tough?
Well done!
Many TRAINERS give up their\nchallenge here and go home.

You should be proud of yourself,
having battled your way through

VICTORY ROAD so courageously.

In recognition of your feat,
I'll teach you DOUBLE-EDGE.

Would you like me to teach that
technique?
I'll teach you the technique\nanytime.
Which POKéMON should I teach\nDOUBLE-EDGE?

Keep that drive going for the
POKéMON LEAGUE!

Take a run at them and knock 'em
out!
I heard rumors of a child prodigy.
The rumors were true!
So, it was you who beat GIOVANNI\nof TEAM ROCKET?
TRAINERS live to seek stronger\nopponents.
Oh!\nSo strong!
By fighting tough battles, you get\nstronger.
I'll show you just how good you\nare. Not!
I'm furious!
You showed me just how good\nI was...
Only the chosen can pass here!
I don't believe it!

All TRAINERS here are headed to
the POKéMON LEAGUE.

Don't let down your guard.
RAY: Together, the two of us are\ndestined for greatness!
RAY: Ludicrous!\nThis can't be!
RAY: You've beaten us.\nGreatness remains elusive...

RAY: Together, the two of us are
striving for the pinnacle.

We need you to bring two POKéMON
into battle with us.
TYRA: We're trying to become\nchampions together.
TYRA: Oh, but...
TYRA: You've taught me that power\ncan be infinite in shape and form.
TYRA: You can't battle with us if\nyou have only one POKéMON.
Who are you?\nHow did you get here?
Oww!\nBeaten!
Blast it... You're dissing TEAM\nROCKET, aren't you?
You broke into TEAM ROCKET's\noperation? What nerve!
Boom!
You're not going to get away with\nthis, brat!
Intruder alert!
I can't do it!
SILPH SCOPE? Humph!\nI don't know where it is.
Why did you come here?
This won't do!
Okay, I'll talk...\nTake the elevator to see my BOSS.
Are you lost, you little mouse?
Why...?
Uh-oh, that ruckus somehow opened\nthe door!
BOSS said you can see ghosts with\nthe SILPH SCOPE.
I surrender!

The TEAM ROCKET HQ has four
underground floors.

Think you can reach the BOSS?
Stop meddling in TEAM ROCKET's\naffairs or else!
Oof!\nTaken down!

SILPH SCOPE?
Oh, that machine the BOSS stole.

It's here somewhere.
We got word from upstairs that you\nwere coming!
What?\nI lost? No!

Go ahead and go!

But you can't run the elevator
without the LIFT KEY.

So! I must say, I am impressed you
got here.

TEAM ROCKET captures POKéMON from
around the world.

They're important tools for keeping
our criminal enterprise going.

I am the leader, GIOVANNI!

For your insolence, you will feel a
world of pain!
WHAT!\nThis can't be!

I see that you raise POKéMON with
utmost care.

A child like you would never
understand what I hope to achieve.

I shall step aside this time!

I hope we meet again...
I know you!\nYou ruined our plans at MT. MOON!
Burned again!
Do you have something against TEAM\nROCKET?
How can you not see the beauty of\nour evil?
Ayaya!
BOSS!\nI'm sorry I failed you!
The elevator doesn't work?\nWho has the LIFT KEY?
No!
Oh, no!\nI dropped the LIFT KEY!
It appears to need a key.

Welcome.

The PRESIDENT is in the boardroom
on 11F.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n1F
Help!\nI'm a SILPH employee.
How did you know\nI was a ROCKET?
I work for both SILPH and TEAM\nROCKET.
It's off-limits here!\nGo home!
You're good.
Can you solve the maze in here?\nIt's not easy, I tell you!
No kids are allowed in here!
Tough!

Diamond-shaped tiles are teleport
blocks.

They're transporters for this
high-tech building.
Hey, kid!\nWhat are you wandering here for?
I goofed!
SILPH CO. will be associated with\nTEAM ROCKET!

Eeek!
No! Stop! Help!

Oh, you're not with TEAM ROCKET.
I'm sorry, I thought...

Will you forgive me if I teach
you the THUNDER WAVE technique?
Oh...\nBut THUNDER WAVE is convenient...
Which POKéMON should I teach\nTHUNDER WAVE?

THUNDER WAVE causes paralysis in
the target POKéMON.

A paralyzed POKéMON may be unable
to move in battle.

It's an ELECTRIC-type move, so it
won't work on some POKéMON.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n2F
I work for SILPH CO.\nWhat am I to do?
{01}!\nYou and your POKéMON saved us!
Quit messing with us, kid!
I give up!
A hint? You can open doors with\na CARD KEY!
I support TEAM ROCKET more than\nI support SILPH CO.!
You really got me!

Humph...

TEAM ROCKET said that if I helped
them, they'd let me study POKéMON.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n3F
Sssh!\nCan't you see I'm hiding?
Huh?\nTEAM ROCKET is gone?
TEAM ROCKET has taken control\nof SILPH CO.!
Arrgh!
Fwahahaha!\nMy BOSS has been after this place!
My POKéMON is my loyal servant.
Darn!\nYou weak POKéMON!

The doors are electronically
locked.

It takes a CARD KEY to open the
doors here.
Intruder spotted!
Who are you?
I better tell the BOSS on 11F!
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n4F

TEAM ROCKET is in an uproar over
some intruder.

That's you, right?
TEAM ROCKET took off!\nYou're our hero! Thank you!
I heard a kid was wandering\naround.
Boom!
It's not smart to pick a fight with\nTEAM ROCKET!
We study POKé BALL technology on\nthis floor.
Dang!\nBlast it!
We worked on the ultimate POKé\nBALL which would catch anything.

Whaaat?

There shouldn't be any children
here!
Oh, goodness!
You're only on 5F.\nIt's a long way to my BOSS!
Show TEAM ROCKET a little respect!
Cough...\nCough...
Which reminds me.\n\nKOFFING evolves into WEEZING!

It's a POKéMON REPORT!

POKéMON LAB created PORYGON,
the first virtual-reality POKéMON.

It's a POKéMON REPORT!

Over 350 POKéMON techniques have
been confirmed.

It's a POKéMON REPORT!

Some POKéMON have been confirmed
to evolve when they are traded.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n5F

Those thugs that took over our
building...

Their BOSS said he was looking for
strong POKéMON.

I hope our PRESIDENT managed to
avoid trouble...
The ROCKETS came and took over\nthe building!
Well, better get back to work.
Oh dear, oh dear.\nHelp me, please!
We got engaged.\nHeheh!
That man next to me...\nHe's such a coward!
He's so helpless, he needed\nsomeone like me to look after him.
TEAM ROCKET is trying to conquer\nthe world with POKéMON.
TEAM ROCKET ran away, and it's all\nbecause of you!
They must have targeted SILPH for\nour POKéMON products.
Come work for SILPH when you\nget older.
I am one of the four ROCKET\nBROTHERS!
Flame out!
No matter!\nMy brothers will avenge me!

That rotten PRESIDENT!

Serves him right for shipping me
off to the TIKSI BRANCH!

That's why TEAM ROCKET came after
us, I'm sure of it!
Shoot!
TIKSI BRANCH?\nIt's in Russian no-man's-land!
You dare betray TEAM ROCKET?
You traitor!
If you stand for justice, you\nbetray us bad guys!
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n6F

Oh! Hi! You're not a ROCKET!
You came to save us?

Why, thank you!

I want you to have this POKéMON
for saving us.
{01} obtained a LAPRAS from\nthe SILPH employee!

It's a LAPRAS.
It's a very intelligent POKéMON.

We kept it in our lab, but it will
be much better off with you.

I think you will be a good TRAINER
for LAPRAS!

It's a good swimmer.
It'll give you a lift across water!

TEAM ROCKET's BOSS went to the
boardroom!

Is our PRESIDENT okay?
I'm worried.
TEAM ROCKET was after the MASTER\nBALL, which catches any POKéMON.
We canceled the MASTER BALL\nproject because of TEAM ROCKET.
It would be bad if TEAM ROCKET\ntook over SILPH or our POKéMON.

Wow!

You chased off TEAM ROCKET all by
yourself?

You!
It's really dangerous here!

You came to save me?
You can't!
Thank you so much!
Uh-oh!\nI smell a little mouse!
Lights out!
You won't find my BOSS by just\nscurrying around!
Heheh!\n\nYou mistook me for a SILPH worker?
I'm done!
Despite your age, you are a\nskilled TRAINER!
I am one of the four ROCKET\nBROTHERS!
Aack!\nBrothers, I lost!
Doesn't matter.\nMy brothers will repay the favor!
A child intruder?\nThat must be you!
Fine!\nI lost!
Go on home before my BOSS gets\nticked off!
{06}: What kept you, {01}?

{06}: Hahaha! I thought you'd
turn up if I waited here!

I guess TEAM ROCKET slowed you
down! Not that I care!

I saw you in SAFFRON, so I decided
to see if you got better!

Oh, man!
So, you are ready for BOSS

ROCKET!

Well, {01}!
I'm moving on up and ahead!

By checking my POKéDEX, I'm
starting to see what's strong and

how they evolve!

Am I a genius or what?

I'm going to the POKéMON LEAGUE to
boot out the ELITE FOUR.

I'll become the world's most
powerful TRAINER!

{01}, well, good luck to you!
Don't sweat it!

Smell ya!
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n7F
I wonder if SILPH is finished...
Thanks for saving us!
That's as far as you'll go!
Not enough grit!
If you don't turn back...\nI'll call for backup!
You're causing us problems!
Huh?\nI lost?
So, what do you think of SILPH\nBUILDING's maze?
I am one of the four ROCKET\nBROTHERS!
Whoo!\nOh, Brothers!
I'll leave you up to my brothers.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n8F

TEAM ROCKET's BOSS is terribly
cruel!

To him, POKéMON are just tools to
be used.

What will happen if that tyrant
takes over our company...
You look tired.\nYou should take a quick nap.
Don't give up!
Thank you so much.
Your POKéMON seem to adore you,\nkid!
Ghaaah!
If I had started as a TRAINER at\nyour age...
Your POKéMON have weak points!\nI can nail them!
You hammered me!
Exploiting weak spots does work.\nThink about type advantages.
I am one of the four ROCKET\nBROTHERS!
Warg!\nBrothers, I lost!
My brothers will avenge me!
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n9F
Welcome to 10F!\nSo good of you to join me!
I'm stunned!
Nice try, but the boardroom is up\none more floor.
Enough of your silly games!
No continues left!
Are you satisfied with beating me?\nThen go on home!
Waaaaa!\nI'm scared!
About me crying...\nPlease keep it a secret.
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n10F

PRESIDENT: Oh, dear boy!
Thank you for saving SILPH.

I will never forget you saved us in
our moment of peril.

I have to thank you in some way.

Because I am rich, I can give you
anything.

Here, maybe this will do.

PRESIDENT: Oh, dear girl!
Thank you for saving SILPH.

I will never forget you saved us in
our moment of peril.

I have to thank you in some way.

Because I am rich, I can give you
anything.

Here, maybe this will do.
{01} obtained a MASTER BALL\nfrom the PRESIDENT!

PRESIDENT: You can't buy that
anywhere.

It's our secret prototype MASTER
BALL.

It will catch any POKéMON without
fail!

You should be quiet about using it,
though.
You have no room for this.

SECRETARY: Thank you for rescuing
all of us.

We, from the PRESIDENT down,
are indebted to you.

Ah, {01}!
So we meet again!

The PRESIDENT and I are discussing
a vital business proposition.

Keep your nose out of grown-up
matters...

Or, experience a world of pain!
Arrgh!!\nI lost again!?

Blast it all!
You ruined our plans for SILPH!

But, TEAM ROCKET will never fall!

{01}! Never forget that all
POKéMON exist for TEAM ROCKET!

I must go, but I shall return!
Stop right there!\nDon't you move!
Don't...\nPlease!
So, you want to see my BOSS?
Halt! Do you have an appointment\nwith my BOSS?
Gaah!\nDemolished!
Watch your step...\nMy BOSS likes his POKéMON tough!
The monitor has POKéMON on it!
SILPH CO. HEAD OFFICE\n11F
Who are you?\nThere shouldn't be anyone here.
Ouch!
A key? I don't know what you're\ntalking about.
W-w-waah! You startled me!\nI thought you were a ghost.
Tch!\nI can't get any wins.

I was exploring here by myself,
but I feel spooked.

I ought to go soon.
A secret switch!\n\nPress it?
Who wouldn't?
Not quite yet!
I can't get out!\nThis old place is one big puzzle.
Oh, no!\nMy bag of loot!
The switches here open and close\nalternating sets of doors.

Diary: July 5
Guyana, South America

A new POKéMON was discovered deep
in the jungle.

Diary: July 10
We christened the newly discovered

POKéMON, MEW.
This place is, like, huge!
Ayah!
I wonder where my partner went.
My mentor once lived here.
Whew!\nOverwhelming!
So, you're stuck?\nTry jumping off over there!

Diary: Feb. 6
MEW gave birth.

We named the newborn MEWTWO.
Uh-oh...\nWhere am I now?
Awooh!
You can find stuff lying around.\nThe residents must've left them.
